name: Pop Ball Meltdown-dash rolling
description:
Pop Ball is a simple, accessible twitch with one small change: Your character can't run.
Where your goal is to escape the Space. The problem is that it seems like everything is trying to break you!

The gameplay is as simple as it is satisfying. The Ball can only jump, and perform an air dash in one of 4 directions. Upon colliding with an object that doesn't break you, you are free to dash again. Use this to navigate a variety of challenges and hazards, including spikes, cannons and even giant monsters.

It's featuring challenging but fair difficulty, the skill lies in your timing, and ability to react.

Features

- Simple, accessible controls. Simple taps and swipes are all you need to play
- Tough but fair difficulty
- So many levels to challenge and conquer
- Multiple leaderboards to challenge your friends!
